resources.Resource:
# Start the embedded ActiveMQ broker. This Broker runs inside TomEE and is bound to the address localhost:61616. # This broker will start when TomEE starts and shutdown when TomEE shuts down. All JMS communication happening inside # TomEE itself will happen using the embedded ActiveMQ Broker over the ActiveMQ "vm" transport which is optimized # for sending and receiving messages when in the same JVM as the Broker.
BrokerXmlConfig = broker:(tcp://localhost:61616)?useJmx=false ServerUrl = vm://localhost?waitForStart=20000&async=true
